summary_reasoning: The Council APPROVES the drastic lowering of the confirmation threshold to 0.505. The current inactivity (21 trades in 1.5 years) renders the strategy untestable. We must accept higher transaction costs to gather data on the edge's existence.

role_verdicts.QuantResearcher: APPROVE. We need N > 100 to measure anything. Let it trade.
role_verdicts.RiskOfficer: APPROVE. Caution: Churn will increase. Monitor comms.
role_verdicts.RealismChecker: APPROVE. You miss 100% of the shots you don't take.
